New coins
Behind the mask

The "Behind the Mask" coin is a unique work of numismatic art symbolizing the phenomenon of hypocrisy that permeates our modern society. It vividly illustrates the disconnect between appearance and the true essence of individuals.

Read more
SAMSON

The "SAMSON" coin is a unique work of numismatic art symbolizing the phenomenon of hypocrisy that permeates our modern society. It vividly illustrates the disconnect between appearance and the true essence of individuals.

Read more
FORTUNA

Fortuna - the Roman goddess of luck, fortune, and fate. She is depicted as a woman holding a cornucopia in her hand and a wheel of fortune, symbolizing the turning of destiny. Fortuna was worshipped in the Roman Empire and regarded as a deity who could bring prosperity and abundance, but also had the power to change a person's fate. She is an important figure in the mythology and art of ancient Rome, and her images can be found on various objects, including coins and frescoes.

Read more
PHOENIX

The "PHOENIX" coin is a unique work of numismatic art symbolizing the phenomenon of hypocrisy that permeates our modern society. It vividly illustrates the disconnect between appearance and the true essence of individuals.
